phase_dependency_problems.reality: Phase 0 never completed, blocking all subsequent phases
phase_dependency_problems.cascade_failure: Failure in Phase 0 invalidated entire 400-hour plan

module_categorization_problems.complexity_explosion: Each module has 3-5 dependencies on average

realistic_scope.incremental: One module at a time —Å full validation

validation_gap.problem: No way to detect plan failure early

test_execution_assumption.impact: No safety net for refactoring changes

process_anti_patterns.scope_creep_tolerance: Allowing scope to grow without pushback

success_factors_missing.risk_mitigation: No fallback plans when assumptions fail
success_factors_missing.stakeholder_reality_check: No external validation of plan feasibility

lessons_for_future_plans.start_small: Begin with 1-2 modules, prove approach works
lessons_for_future_plans.validate_early: Get something working before expanding scope
lessons_for_future_plans.question_assumptions: Test every major assumption with prototype
lessons_for_future_plans.embrace_uncertainty: Plan for unknown unknowns with buffer time
lessons_for_future_plans.iterative_approach: Multiple small cycles instead of one big plan

key_differences: Proof-of-concept first vs big design upfront

creating_new_task: 2. Replace all placeholder values with actual task data
3. Update the task_template to task_data in the structure
4. Fill in category-specific fields if applicable
5. Set appropriate priority and estimated timeline
6. Define clear success and acceptance criteria
updating_task: 2. Move completed phases to completed_phases array
3. Update current_phase to reflect current work
5. Update actual performance metrics as work progresses
completing_task: 1. Ensure all phases are marked as completed
5. Create new active task if needed

deliverables_created: Current state assessment with technical debt
